metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2443 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Qualcomm MDP driver in Android before 2016-05-01 on Nexus 5 and Nexus 7 (2013) devices allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 26404525.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
